thread.title: Good location for first time visit
thread.title_full: Good location for first time visit - Review of The French Quarters Guest Apartments, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: llynnm
title: Good location for first time visit
text: Hotel is near the theaters and 2 blocks from Time's Square. On 'Restaurant Row" so many, many choices of great restaurants. Service here was friendly, nice bathroom, but zero counter space which was very unusual for a hotel - pedestal sink. Hotel room used some valuable space for a cooktop and kitchenette sink and kitchen storage, but no kitchenware, weird and poor use of space. Would have been much nicer if there were a dresser or better space to unpack luggage. We were worried about noise, but room on floor 2 was very quiet, overall a good value.
